Portland.Maseeh College of Engineering and Comput: The Fariborz Maseeh College of Engineering and Computer Science is an Engineering college in the Portland State University in the 2004 the college named after an Iranian pioneer called Fariborz Maseeh, who is a famous engineer in the field of Microelectromechanical systems (MEMS). after a fund giving by one of its alumni; Fariborz Maseeh gave the largest gift in the history of PSU to support building the Northwest Center for Engineering, naming it Maseeh College of Engineering and Computer Science. It also endows professorships and graduate scholarships.
